thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice 4 star hotel
thread.title_full: Very nice 4 star hotel - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: phileigner
title: Very nice 4 star hotel
text: Good sized room for Paris. Very clean and modern with a fun film theme throughout. . Included breakfast was very good with large selection of meats, cheeses, eggs, cereal, pastries, cafes, etc. Most things of interest are a short metro/taxi/Uber ride away. Metro is on the corner. You can walk many places but the walk is not short. We just returned from a 5 night stay and would definitely return again. Just don't expect 5 star luxury and you will be pleasantly surprised by the value and very nice staff.
